class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/CameraFocusFrontend
class.description: (NEW) Allows the user to focus the 3D camera at pre-defined locations.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/InteractiveManipulationFrontend
class.description: Allows the user to request and assist with manipulation tasks.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/PointHeadCamera
class.description: Displays an image from a camera, with the visualized world rendered behind it. A click into the display window will make the robot look in that direction.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/PublishClickCamera
class.description: Displays an image from a camera, with the visualized world rendered behind it. A click into the display window publish the coordinates of the point on a specified topic.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/LookAt
class.description: Makes the robot look at a specific location.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/SetGripper
class.description: Puts the virtual gripper to a specific location.

class.name: pr2_interactive_manipulation_frontend/NavigateTo
class.description: Sets the navgation goal to a specific location.
